page.title: 08THE MAJORETTES
page.content: I am a ten year old girl.My main interest is Majorettes. Majorettes practice is held at St Day School every Tuesday and Friday for two hours. The name of our Majorette troup is{St Day Starlettes.} We have to wear a leotard,white ankle socks and white plimsolls.We use a baton as a piece of equipment. I have won second prize at the{ {National Championships.}The class I performed in was"Military Strut."I have also won prizes in ordinary competitions. When we go to the National Championships we stay overnight in caravans. I enjoy myself at Majorettes.
